title.rendered: Herba Hair Oil 100 ML Nourishes Scalp Controls Hair Fall, Strengthens Hair & Promotes Hair Growth

content.rendered:
• Herbai Hair Oil is crafted using a cold-pressed extraction method, formulated with a potent blend of 12 Ayurvedic herbs. It offers a holistic approach to hair care.
  • The combination of Methi seed powder, Jaswand, Amla and Kapur oil nourish the scalp, address dryness and create an ideal formulation for hair growth.

Key Benefits:

  • Natural Hair Growth: Nourishes the scalp and strengthens hair follicles, encouraging healthy hair growth.
  • Shine & Luster: Enriched with Amla powder and Kapur (Camphor) to boost the shine and luster of your hair, leaving it vibrant and radiant.
  • Prevents Split Ends: Regular use helps to prevent split ends and promote overall hair health.
  • Calming & Conditioning: Offers a soothing and conditioning formula, addressing dryness and maintaining a healthy scalp.
  • Anti Fungal: Camphor oil, the key ingredient is known for its anti fungal and anti bacterial properties.
  • Helps promote healthy hair and prevents split ends.

Direction of use: Gently massage Keshohills Plus Forte Hair Oil  into hair ensuring that the entire scalp is covered. The treatment works as a natural conditioner if left on for at least 20 minutes. Cleanse post-treatment with Herbal Hills Hair Wash and warm water. May also be left overnight if desired.

Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Processed with Henna leaf, Brahmi leaf, Aloevera leaf, Betel leaf, Methi seed powder, Kalonji seed powder, Bhrungraj powder, Amla powder, Jaswand flower, Sarso oil, Kapoor oil, Fragrance (Almond).

Legal Disclaimer: Natural Herbal Formulations tend to change color over time. However, product efficacy remains unchanged.
